ก.instructions: Lift the back part of your tongue to touch the soft palate quickly to make the sound.

ข.instructions: Lift the back part of your tongue to touch the soft palate and push the air out.

ฃ.instructions: Lift the back part of your tongue to touch the soft palate and push the air out.

ค.instructions: Lift the back part of your tongue to touch the soft palate and push the air out.

ฅ.instructions: Lift the back part of your tongue to touch the soft palate and push the air out.

ฆ.instructions: Lift the back part of your tongue to touch the soft palate and push the air out.

ง.instructions: Lift the back part of your tongue to touch the soft palate and push the air out through the nose.

จ.instructions: Lift the front part of your tongue and touch the hard palate quickly to make the sound.

ฉ.instructions: Lift the front part of your tongue and touch the hard palate quickly to make the sound.

ช.instructions: Lift the front part of your tongue and touch the hard palate quickly to make the sound.

ซ.instructions: Move the middle part of your tongue up to almost touch the hard palate and force air through to create friction.

ฌ.instructions: Lift the front part of your tongue and touch the hard palate quickly to make the sound.

ญ.instructions: Lift the front part of your tongue to touch the hard palate quickly and push the air through the mouth and nose.

ฎ.instructions: Lift the front part near to the tip of your tongue and touch the hard palate quickly to make the sound.

ฏ.instructions: Lift the tip of your tongue and touch the hard palate quickly to make the sound.

ฐ.instructions: Lift the front part near to the tip of your tongue to touch the hard palate just above your teeth quickly to make the sound.

ฑ.meaning: mon-tor means a female character in a classical Thai play
ฑ.instructions: Lift the front part near to the tip of your tongue to touch the hard palate just above your teeth quickly to make the sound.

ฒ.pronunciation: ฒอ ผู้เฒ่า
ฒ.instructions: Lift the front part near to the tip of your tongue to touch the hard palate just above your teeth quickly to make the sound.

ณ.instructions: Lift the front part of your tongue to touch the hard palate quickly and push the air through the open mouth and the nose.

ด.instructions: Lift the front part near to the tip of your tongue and touch the hard palate quickly to make the sound.

ต.instructions: Lift the tip of your tongue and touch the hard palate quickly to make the sound.

ถ.instructions: Lift the front part near to the tip of your tongue to touch the hard palate just above your teeth quickly to make the sound.

ท.instructions: Lift the front part near to the tip of your tongue to touch the hard palate just above your teeth quickly to make the sound.

ธ.instructions: Lift the front part near to the tip of your tongue to touch the hard palate just above your teeth quickly to make the sound.

น.instructions: Lift the front part of your tongue to touch the hard palate quickly and push the air through the open mouth and the nose.

บ.instructions: Close your lips and push the air out to exaggerate the sound.

ป.instructions: Close your lips and push the air out to exaggerate the sound.

ผ.instructions: Close your mouth and use the lips to make the sound by forcing air through the mouth.

ฝ.instructions: Close your mouth and use the lips to make the sound by forcing air through the mouth.

พ.instructions: Close your mouth and use the lips to make the sound by forcing air through the mouth.

ฟ.instructions: Close your mouth and use the lips to make the sound by forcing air through the mouth.

ภ.instructions: Close your mouth and use the lips to make the sound by forcing air through the mouth.

ม.instructions: Close your lips and let the air flow out through the nose to make the sound.

ย.instructions: Raise the middle part of your tongue close to the roof of your mouth to make the sound.

ร.instructions: Vibrate your tongue against the roof of your mouth to create the sound.

ล.instructions: Raise the tip of your tongue to the roof of your mouth to make the sound.

ว.instructions: Round your lips and let the air flow out to make the sound.

ศ.instructions: Move the middle part of your tongue up to almost touch the roof of your mouth and force air through to create friction.

ษ.instructions: Move the middle part of your tongue up to almost touch the roof of your mouth and force air through to create friction.

ส.instructions: Move the middle part of your tongue up to almost touch the roof of your mouth and force air through to create friction.

ห.instructions: Open your mouth and push the air out to make the sound.

ฬ.instructions: Raise the tip of your tongue to the roof of your mouth to make the sound.

อ.instructions: Open your mouth and push the air out without touching any part of your mouth.

ฮ.instructions: Open your mouth and push the air out to make the sound.
